tool_description: Monitors and analyzes job posting performance across platforms including views, applications, and engagement metrics.

posting_ids.description: List of posting IDs to monitor

monitoring_period.description: Time period for analysis: daily, weekly, or monthly

error_messages: Invalid posting IDs: One or more posting IDs are not found or inaccessible
Platform data unavailable: Unable to retrieve performance data from one or more platforms
Invalid monitoring period: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly]
Too many postings: Maximum 20 postings can be monitored simultaneously
Insufficient data: Not enough performance data available for the specified period
usage: Provide posting IDs and their corresponding platforms. Optionally specify monitoring period. The tool retrieves and analyzes performance metrics for all specified postings.

total_views.description: Total number of job posting views across all platforms

application_rate.description: Application rate as percentage of total views

engagement_trends.description: Trends in engagement over the monitoring period
